question: is numerology(ilm ul aadad) allowed in islam.
answer:
QUESTION
Is it ok to consult a numerology(ilm ul aadad) expert for our problems
ANSWER


Share:
It is not permissible to practise numerology to solve problems.

It is also not permissible to consult a person practising numerology.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
